name: Evolution (itch) (rethuna)
description:
The bar on top of the player is your current life span.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys / WASD to move.
  • Up Arrow / Space to Jump.

Game Loop

  • Collect eggs to avoid extinction.
  • Eat food to make future generations stronger.
  • Survive

A tiny game I made over a weekend, for the Wowie Game Jam #3.
